Address.Address1: CARRETERA GIP-6531 DE PALAFRUGELL A BEGUR KM 1.2

Description.Text: This hotel is located in a residential area and enjoys a natural setting surrounded by woods in the heart of the Costa Brava. The beach is 5 km away, as are the nearest bars, shops and nightspots as well as public transport links (Palafrugell). It is 6 km to the centre of Begur, and the bays of Calella and Tamariu are just a short drive away. The tourist centre of Platja D'Aro is 19 km away and it is 20 km to the River Ter, 25 km to FlaÃ§a railway station, 51 km to Banyoles Lake and 55 km to Girona. The DalÃ­ Museum is just over an hour's drive, as is CadaquÃ©s, and it is 2 hours' drive to Barcelona. The ski region of Vallter 2000 is 127 km away and it is 55 km to Girona Airport and 137 km to Barcelona Airport.

All rooms are individually decorated in traditional style and all come with a private bathroom with a shower/bathtub and a hairdryer. They offer a double bed and are equipped with direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, free wireless Internet access and a safe. Furthermore, individually regulated air conditioning, and heating are provided in all accommodation as standard. Some rooms are located in the old farmhouse and others in the new annexe, next to the pool. All rooms feature either a balcony or a terrace.

This charming beach hotel has a garden area and comprises a total of 25 rooms. Facilities on offer to guests include a lobby, a hotel safe, a cloakroom and a games room. There is a TV lounge and the younger guests can enjoy the children's playground. Visitors have a cafÃ©, a bar and a restaurant serving typical dishes of Mediterranean cuisine at their disposal and they will appreciate the conference facilities and wireless Internet access. They can take advantage of the laundry services, as well as free parking spaces. It is also possible to hire bicycles on the premises.
